message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation
I understand the inflation puts pressure on me, but your offer was too low. This is a more balanced proposal.
Considering the increasing inflation impact on you, I think this is a reasonable adjustment
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option. The value will be significantly diminished for both of us if we continue.
You said the value will be significantly diminished, but it only affects you. I'll take a bit more
